description: Advanced laboratory work on the synthesis, structure, and properties of organiccompounds. Infrared, ultraviolet, and nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy. Lectures cover the theoretical basis and applications of modern spectroscopic methods. For safety reasons students will not be permitted to wear contact lenses in the laboratory.
name: ADV SYNTH & SPECTRO LAB: Advanced Synthesis and Spectroscopy Lab
